text: Erie County is a county in the state of New York in the United States. As of the 2020 census, 954,236 people lived there. The county seat is Buffalo. The cities of Lackawanna and Tonawanda are in Erie County. Erie County is home to the Buffalo Bills football team, the Buffalo Sabres hockey team, and the Buffalo Bandits lacrosse team. == References == Category:New York (state) counties
title: Erie County, New York
